title: The MHR Qualified Supplier information Schema

emailAddress.description: The email address of the individual or business.

phoneNumber.description: Free form text with area code for the party contact phone number without an extension value.

phoneExtension.description: The contact phone number extension value.

termsAccepted.description: Included in the POST response to indicate the terms of agreement document has been accepted by the account submitting the request.

confirmRequirements.description: Applies to QS dealers: indicates that the dealer has confirmed acceptance of additional requirements regarding registrations.

locationAddress.description: Applies to QS dealers: specifies the location address for transport permit related registrations.
